title: The Void Cartel
location: Market Ward -> The Velvet Syndicate's Deep Vault
description: The cartels you dismantled in the cellars were just distributors. The true source of the corrupted Void-Wine is the Velvet Syndicate's master vault. You must shut off the flow permanently.

turns.narrative: The vault is guarded by Void-Thralls, humans mutated by raw magical wine into hulking brutes with glowing blue veins.
turns.choice_a: Focus fire on the glowing veins
turns.consequence_a: The veins rupture, spilling volatile wine that damages other thralls nearby.
turns.choice_b: Sweep the legs and use blunt weapons
turns.consequence_b: You avoid puncturing the veins, keeping the fight clean but taking longer to bring them down.

turns.narrative: Boss Silas is drinking pure Void-Wine directly from a vat. He transforms into a massive Void-Aberration.
turns.choice_a: Use holy/cleansing magic to purge the Void
turns.consequence_a: The magic burns the Void out of him rapidly. He shrinks back to human size, weakened for an easy kill.
turns.consequence_b: A terrifying fight. He teleports erratically using Void magic, nearly killing you before you land a fatal blow.

cartel_purged.description: You cleansed the vault and killed Boss Silas effortlessly.

cartel_slain.description: You defeated the Aberration in a brutal duel.

conclusion: You cleansed the vault and killed Boss Silas effortlessly.

risk_matrix.critical_failure: The attempt failed with minor lasting consequences. The thread remains open.
